content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mary. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what budget you have in mind for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible. Can you tell me your offer?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Of course, Mary. Based on the current market rates, I am willing to rent out my 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim for €500 per month. This price includes all utilities and maintenance costs. However, I am open to negotiating if you have a lower budget in mind.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am interested in your offer of €500 per month. I agree to the price of €500 per month.

Is there anything else I should know before signing the lease agreement?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Yes, Mary, there are a few things you should keep in mind before signing the lease agreement. First, you will need to provide a security deposit of one month's rent upfront. Second, you will be responsible for paying all utilities and maintenance costs during your tenancy. Third, you will need to sign a lease agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of your tenancy. Lastly, you will need to provide proof of income and employment to be considered for tenancy.
name: Heinrich Heine
